column1: '''The Return of the King''' is the seventeenth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].   The 10 minute and 14 second work covers much of the "many endings" of the movie except for the Grey Havens.  Featured are the talents of Sir James Galway and Renée Flemming.  For the section of Aragorn’s Coronation
column2: [[Viggo Mortensen]] provided the melody for the words of J.R.R. Tolkien:

column1: Out of the Great Sea to Middle-earth I am come.  In this place will I abide
column3: unto the ending of the world.

column1: Et Eärello Endorenna utúlien.  Sinome maruvan ar Hildinyar tenn’ Ambar-metta!<ref>{{RK|VI5}}</ref>
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]
